title: Design and Operation of a Performance Measurement System for Public Institutions

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Public Administration Theories and Basic Data Analysis Concepts
context.additional_context: Utilization of smartphone-based learning materials and performance of practical case-centered projects.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze public institution performance indicator systems and design measurement approaches tailored to organizational characteristics.
Learners can establish stakeholder collaboration strategies during performance measurement to enhance institutional acceptance.
Learners can conduct projects to collect and analyze performance data using smartphone apps in resource-constrained technical environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
